value.stringValue: New Sales Opp from Account Button

choices.name: choice_ps
choices.choiceText: Professional Services: to be qualified and work by the Professional Services team

choices.name: choice_sales_opp
choices.choiceText: Sales: to be qualified and worked by an AE

choices.name: Stage0
choices.choiceText: (0) Booking Meeting: You are actively prospecting into this account with the goal of scheduling a meeting

choices.name: Stage1
choices.choiceText: (1) Qualification: You have scheduled or attended a meeting with the customer/prospect

decisions.name: Is_opp_creator_same_as_qualifying_rep
decisions.label: Is opp creator same as qualifying rep?

decisions.name: Is_opp_creator_same_as_qualifying_rep_0_0
decisions.label: Is opp creator same as qualifying rep?

Flow.description: Removing disabled check on Industry dropdown.
Flow.label: Account - New Opportunity

recordLookups.name: Get_open_convert_to_annual_opps
recordLookups.label: Get open convert to annual opps

fields.name: cant_create_header
fields.fieldText:
You cannot create a new opportunity on this account because this account is a committed customer on a monthly agreement.


Please use the following open conversion opportunity to track your engagement with this customer as you work to transition them to an annual agreement:


{!Get_open_convert_to_annual_opps.Name}

fields.name: warning_unqual_opps
fields.fieldText:
Warning: an open unqualified opportunity already exists on this account already:


{!Get_open_unqualified_opps.Name}


It is recommended that you use the above opportunity to track your activity. If you still would like to create another opportunity, please click Next.

fields.name: cant_create_header_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot create a new opportunity on this account as an SDR you should be using the current open Journey on the Contact to qualify and pass into an Opportunity.


If there is no Journey, please create one on the relevant contact.


Current open Journeys at this account are displayed here:

fields.name: Details_header
fields.fieldText: You are creating an {!opportunity_subtype} opportunity:

fields.name: Stage
fields.fieldText: Stage

fields.name: qual_mtg_scheduled_date
fields.fieldText: On what date was calendar invite sent out?
fields.helpText: This is the date when the meeting was booked on the calendar; not the date when the meeting actually occurred.

fields.name: sales_qual_meeting_date
fields.fieldText: On what date is the qualification meeting scheduled to actually occur?

value.stringValue: Please select the primary contact you will met with as part of the qualification process

fields.name: Close_Date
fields.fieldText: Close Date

fields.name: Next_Step
fields.fieldText: Next Step

fields.name: Next_Step_Date
fields.fieldText: Next Step Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Next step date must be in the future

fields.name: Open_deals_found_header
fields.fieldText: This account has one or more open committed deals.

fields.name: related_to_deal_choice
fields.fieldText: Is the Professional Services opportunity you are about to create related to an open deal?

value.stringValue: Select the related open deal from the list below:

fields.name: What_kind_of_opportunity_are_you_creating
fields.fieldText: What kind of opportunity are you creating?

fields.name: pre_qual_header
fields.fieldText:
This deal will be qualified by {!newOpp.Sales_Qualified_By__r.FirstName} {!newOpp.Sales_Qualified_By__r.LastName}.


Below, please provide context as to the opportunity this deal represents to aid in the qualification process. This will be stored on the opportunity record and sent to {!newOpp.Sales_Qualified_By__r.FirstName} {!newOpp.Sales_Qualified_By__r.LastName}:

fields.name: pre_qual_notes
fields.fieldText: Pre-Qualification Notes

fields.name: Account_details_Header
fields.fieldText: Before you create an opportunity, please help us by filling in a few account details first.

fields.name: Set_Employee_Count
fields.fieldText: Set Employee Count

fields.name: Set_employee_count_header
fields.fieldText: We do not know how many employees this account has. Please navigate to LinkedIn, look up the number of employees, and input below

fields.name: Number_of_employees_from_LinkedIn
fields.fieldText: Number of employees from LinkedIn

validationRule.errorMessage: Please input a number greater than zero

fields.name: Set_Industry
fields.fieldText: Set Industry

fields.name: set_industry_text
fields.fieldText: We do not know what industry this account operates within. Please select your best understanding of the industry for this account:

fields.name: Select_an_industry
fields.fieldText: Select an industry

fields.name: Optional_Set_Short_a
fields.fieldText: Optional: Set Short Name

fields.name: Set_short_name_header
fields.fieldText:
The name of this account ({!recordId.Name}) is a bit long. Is there an abbreviated / alternative shorthand name we can use instead?


For example, you might enter "IBM" instead of International Business Machines.

fields.name: Enter_a_shorthand_name
fields.fieldText: Enter a shorthand name

validationRule.errorMessage: Shorthand name is too long. Please enter a name under 30 characters.

fields.name: short_Name_footnote
fields.fieldText: Note: Entering a value won't change the account's name. It will be stored separately.

textTemplates.name: Email_BDR
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!Get_Open_Contact_Journey.Owner:User.Name},


{!$User.FirstName} has just created an Opportunity before you could create one via the open Journey record.


Please use the Pass to Opp button to associate the open Journey record if you wish to receive sourced by credit.

textTemplates.name: tam_pre_qual
textTemplates.text: What problem is the customer trying to solve and how do you think Retool can help? Was the AE/AM already aware of this opportunity? [yes/no] What specific activities led you to uncover this opportunity? Please provide any other information that would help the AE/AM qualify the opportunity:
